page.title: 05HAIL WESTON -
page.content: Hail Weston lies to the West of Little Paxton and the A1.The village stands high, the church steeple of St. Neots Church seems to stand level with the villages main street. Mr.Jones the chairman of the Hail Weston Parish Council arranged for us to talk to Mrs.Coward,the vice-chairman and Mr.J.Arnold.These respected residents of long standing answered our questions and gave us a lot of interesting information. The village has two public houses and when we did our walk around to survey the area our teacher arranged for us to have a sandwich lunch in the Crown pubs garden.We had a glass of lemonade each and Sir had a shandy with the two ladies who came with us.The landlord gave us discount but the barmaid did not think much of pouring out twentysix glasses of pop .
